events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles is now assigned to manage your application progress.
Your profile looks promising; we have completed the initial screening and will be moving forward with the interview process.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions and confirming your availability for technical interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM. Please prepare to discuss your software development experience.
The technical interview concluded successfully, with discussion around system design, coding skills, and problem-solving abilities.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on May 23rd at 2 PM to discuss cultural fit and company policies.
The HR interview was completed and feedback was positive regarding your alignment with company values and communication skills.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer with excitement, looking forward to contributing your skills to our software development projects.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and initial training scheduled to help you integrate smoothly.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. Welcome aboard as a valued software engineer in our team!
